text: Mama Baer (born Andrea Katharina Ingeborg Göthling; 29 October 1981) works as a sound recordist in the field of Noise and Post-industrial music, visual artist and film maker at Flensburg, a town on the German border with Denmark. She often works together with her husband Kommissar Hjuler as Kommissar Hjuler und Frau. As self-taught artist she began making music in 1999 and visual art in 2006. She is considered to work in the field of neo dada and art brut.testcard no. 16 - Extremismus, Ventil Verlag, , p 101-107 Mama Baer has a huge amount of music releases available at independent labels like Ultra Eczema, Intransitive Recordings,Asylum Lunaticum, CD, (INT033), mentioned at The Wire (magazine)'s years review, issue 311, Jan. 2010, as one of the best 15 albums of the year 2009 in outsider music Nihilist Records, Obskyr Records and others. She shares albums with Bomis Prendin, Franz Kamin, Philip Krumm, Wolf Vostell, Goodiepal, Jerry Hunt, Andre Borges, Family Fodder, Cecilie Bjørgås Jordheim, Die Form, Antye Greie, Jörg Piringer, Joël Hubaut, Déficit Des Années Antérieures (DDAA), Negativland, Demosthenes Agrafiotis, Marc Hurtado, Hiroshi Hasegawa, Thurston Moore, Jaap Blonk, Jonathan Meese, Tim Berresheim, Family Fodder, Gianni-Emilio Simonetti, Smegma, Emil Siemeister, Morphogenesis, Zuzana Husarova, Allan Revich, Alex Lozupone, Paul Feitzinger, Nonoko Yoshida, Maja Ratkje/Hild Sofie Tafjord/Lotta Melin, Mischa Badasyan, Smell & Quim, Anna Homler & David Moss, Steuart Liebig, David Toop, Rudolf Eb.er, Sudden Infant, John Wiese, Derek Beaulieu, Jo Kondo, Peter Ablinger, Sven-Åke Johansson, LSD March, Pyrolator, Sabrina Benaim, Tonya Ingram, and collaborated with Milan Knizak, GX Jupitter-Larsen, Dada Action Group, Hans- Joachim Hespos, Charlemagne Palestine, Boris Lurie and Dietmar Kirves, Arnulf Meifert, Gen Ken Montgomery and Conrad Schnitzler, The New Blockaders, Rod Summers, Deutsch Nepal, Frans de Waard, Roel Meelkop, Lt. Caramel, Richard Ramirez, Bryan Lewis Saunders, Z'EV, John M. Bennett, Jaan Patterson, Kris T Reeder and Alig Fodder.Article in November 2010 issue of The Wire (magazine), no. 321, page 18, and review mentioned on front sleeve of issue, consisting mainly of an interview with Daniel Spicer, also Bad Alchemy, issues 51, 54 and 59, and skug Magazine, March 26th 2010 Kommissar Hjuler und Frau performed live at several festivals like Colour out of Space Festival, Brighton, 2009, Zappanale, Bad Doberan, 2010, Incubate (festival) Nijmegen, 2010, and at artists' venues like Morden Tower, Café Oto or Mary Bauermeister's performance space.August 2nd 2009, in a series of performances that previously featured John Cage, Nam June Paik, Jean Tinguely, Niki de Saint Phalle and Karlheinz Stockhausen They performed live with Jan van den Dobbelsteen and Danielle Lemaire,Paulo Post Futurum , Lokkal 01, Breda, November 3rd to 4th 2007, and to end all live, iLLUSEUM , Amsterdam, August 1st 2009, videos at youtube Eugene Chadbourne,Musikpalast Flensburg on July 12th 2008 John Wiese,KKI Flensburg on January 19th 2008 Heather Leigh Murray, Clive Graham, and others. As artist she has been involved in several solo and group art exhibitions around the world.artlout:com magazine, Leipzig, 2009, issue 04:08 Short films by Mama Baer have been presented at several film festivals. Since 9 November 2009 she has been a member of the NO!art movement, founded by Boris Lurie, Stanley Fisher and Sam Goodman at March gallery New York in 1960, since 1999 led by Dietmar Kirves and Clayton Patterson. The German novel writer Peter Rathke, who works under pseudonym FOLTERGAUL, presented Mama Baer as character at his novel "Im Knast mit Kommissar Hjuler und Mama Baer"."Im Knast mit Kommissar Hjuler und Mama Baer", P.Rathke Verlag, 2011 (), Deutsche Nationalbibliothek Mama Baer appears as a character, played by Kathleen Gregory, in a partially completed short film by Fred Wilder.
